name: General
description: A selection of the most common programs, suitable for a fresh install.

software.name: Google Chrome
software.desc: Google Chrome is a freeware web browser developed by Google.

software.name: Mozilla Firefox
software.desc: Mozilla Firefox is a free and open-source web browser developed by Mozilla Foundation.

software.name: WinRAR
software.desc: WinRAR is a file archiver utility for Windows.

software.name: Discord
software.desc: Discord is a proprietary voice chat application designed for gaming communities.

software.name: TeamSpeak 3
software.desc: TeamSpeak is a proprietary voice-over-Internet Protocol application for audio communication between users on a chat channel.

software.name: Skype
software.desc: kype is a telecommunications application software product that specializes in providing video chat and voice calls between computers.

software.name: WinDirStat
software.desc: WinDirStat is a free and open-source graphical disk usage analyzer for Microsoft Windows.

software.name: TeamViewer 13
software.desc: TeamViewer is a proprietary computer software package for remote control, desktop sharing, online meetings, web conferencing and file transfer between computers.

software.name: Unchecky
software.desc: Unchecky aims to keep potentially unwanted programs out of your computer by unchecking unneeded checkboxes in wizards.

software.name: CCleaner
software.desc: CCleaner is a utility program used to clean potentially unwanted files and invalid Windows Registry entries from a computer.

software.name: VCL Media Player
software.desc: VLC media player is a free and open-source, portable and cross-platform media player and streaming media server.

software.name: LibreOffice
software.desc: LibreOffice is a free and open source office suite, a project of The Document Foundation.

software.name: Speccy
software.desc: Speccy finds details of your computer's specs. Great for spotting issues or finding compatible upgrades.

software.name: Notepad++
software.desc: Notepad++ is a superior text editor and source code editor for use with Microsoft Windows.

software.name: Recuva
software.desc: Recuva is an undeletion program for Windows. It is able to undelete files that have been marked as deleted and recover corrupted hard and USB drives.

name: Gaming
description: A bundle for optimizing gameplay and gaming experience.

software.name: Steam
software.desc: Steam is a digital distribution platform which offers digital rights management, multiplayer gaming, video streaming and social networking services.

software.name: GOG Galaxy
software.desc: The gaming Client designed for a convenient purchasing, playing and updating games, as well as an online play between gaming platforms.

software.name: Razer Cortex
software.desc: A program for gaming optimization and easy recording.

software.name: NVIDIA GeForce Experience
software.desc: GeForce Experience automatically notifies you of driver updates and installs with one click, ensuring you always have the latest NVIDIA drivers and PC game settings.

software.name: EVGA Precision
software.desc: A GPU overclocking tool made by EVGA.

software.name: CPU-Z
software.desc: CPU-Z is a freeware system profiling and monitoring application for Microsoft Windows that detects the CPU, RAM, motherboard chipset, and other hardware features of a modern personal computer.

software.name: HWMonitor
software.desc: HWMonitor is a hardware monitoring program that reads PC systems main health sensors, voltages, temperatures and fan speed.

software.name: MSI Kombustor
software.desc: Kombustor is an exclusive burn-in benchmarking tool based on the well-known Furmark software. This program is specifically designed to push your graphics card to the limits to test stability and thermal performance.
